metadata.title: He Shall, from Time to Time...
metadata.time_reference: During the President's State of the Union preparations

notes: First mention of President Bartlet having Multiple Sclerosis.
The soap opera Bartlet watches is NBC's 'Passions'.
Leo McGarry's past substance-abuse problem comes to light.
This episode features the character Lord John Marbury, who becomes a recurring guest.

in_universe_mythology: References to U.S. politics and governance.
real_world_cultural_references: The presidential cabinet and line of succession.
items: State of the Union speech draft

continuity_notes: This episode sets up major plotlines for Leo's character throughout the series.
Abigail Bartlet's character continues to play a significant role in personal and political events.

plot.plot_summary: As President Bartlet prepares for the State of the Union, he collapses, leading to a crisis as his staff navigates the fallout. Amidst a brewing international conflict between India and Pakistan, and escalating personal challenges for their lives in the limelight, the staff must keep everything under control while juggling their personal lives. The episode introduces potential scandal regarding Leo McGarry's past, and concludes with Bartlet displayed as a resilient leader meeting with a key staff member.
